name: Detailhandel Nederland
membership: Detailhandel Nederland, the Dutch Retail Association, is an active member of EuroCommerce.  www.eurocommerce.eu
goal: Detailhandel Nederland, the Dutch Retail Association, represents the collective social and economic interests of the Dutch retailers.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Enterprise, Environment, Food Safety, Home Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Regional Policy, Taxation, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives: Internal Market, Environment, Food Safety, Trade, Digital Agenda, Payments
